titles.title: A bill to increase the personal exemption from customs duties for returning residents when merchandise is purchased in countries that are beneficiary countries under the Caribbean Basin Initiative.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 2/24/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase the personal exemption from customs duties (but no more than $100 of value) of articles acquired in one or more of the beneficiary countries under the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act.
